item.title: Malware Analysis : WannaCry (part 1)
item.description: Walkthrough of my malware analysis for the Bossfight challenge from the Practical Malware Analysis & Triage course created by @HuskyHacks. This time, I dive into the infamous WannaCry, a great challenge to apply everything I’ve learnt from now on !
